data.title: Zoom Video's for home service to expand to Amazon's Echo, Facebook's Portal and Google's Nest

data.title: Google launches Kormo app in India to help people find entry-level jobs
data.text: Google said on Wednesday it has expanded its jobs app, called Kormo Jobs, to India as the Search giant looks to offer a helping hand to millions looking for entry-level roles and further displace Microsoft’s LinkedIn relevance in the world’s second largest internet market. The company first launched Kormo Jobs in Bangladesh in 2018 and […]
